trans-unit.source: Provides the means to access and manage an in-process speech recognition engine.
trans-unit.target: Ger möjlighet att komma åt och hantera taligenkänningsmotor i processen.

trans-unit.source: You can create an instance of this class for any of the installed speech recognizers.
trans-unit.target: Du kan skapa en instans av den här klassen för någon av de installerade taligenkänning.

trans-unit.source: To get information about which recognizers are installed, use the static <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InstalledRecognizers%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: För att få information om vilka är installerade, använder du statiskhet <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InstalledRecognizers%2A>metod.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InstalledRecognizers%2A>

trans-unit.source: This class is for running speech recognition engines in-process, and provides control over various aspects of speech recognition, as follows: - To create an in-process speech recognizer, use one of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.%23ctor%2A> constructors.
trans-unit.target: Den här klassen gäller körs speech recognition motorer i processen och ger kontroll över olika aspekter av taligenkänning, enligt följande: – Om du vill skapa en pågående taligenkänningen ska du använda en av de <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.%23ctor%2A>konstruktorer.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: - To manage speech recognition grammars, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammar%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammarAsync%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.UnloadGrammar%2A>, and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.UnloadAllGrammars%2A> methods, and the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.Grammars%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: -Om du vill hantera speech recognition grammatik, använda den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammar%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammarAsync%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.UnloadGrammar%2A>, och <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.UnloadAllGrammars%2A>metoder och <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.Grammars%2A>egenskap.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.Grammars%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.UnloadAllGrammars%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.UnloadGrammar%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammarAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammar%2A>

trans-unit.source: - To configure the input to the recognizer, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToAudioStream%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToDefaultAudioDevice%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToNull%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveFile%2A>, or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveStream%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: -Konfigurera indata till tolken med den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToAudioStream%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToDefaultAudioDevice%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToNull%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveFile%2A>, eller <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveStream%2A>metod.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveStream%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveFile%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToNull%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToDefaultAudioDevice%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToAudioStream%2A>

trans-unit.source: - To perform speech recognition, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.Recognize%2A> or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsync%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: -Om du vill utföra taligenkänning måste använda den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.Recognize%2A>eller <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsync%2A>metod.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.Recognize%2A>

trans-unit.source: - To modify how recognition handles silence or unexpected input, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.BabbleTimeout%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InitialSilenceTimeout%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeout%2A>, and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeoutAmbiguous%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: -Om du vill ändra hur recognition hanterar tystnad eller oväntat indata, använda den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.BabbleTimeout%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InitialSilenceTimeout%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeout%2A>, och <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeoutAmbiguous%2A>Egenskaper.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeoutAmbiguous%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeout%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InitialSilenceTimeout%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.BabbleTimeout%2A>

trans-unit.source: - To change the number of alternates the recognizer returns, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.MaxAlternates%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: -Du kan ändra antalet ersättare tolken returnerar den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.MaxAlternates%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.MaxAlternates%2A>

trans-unit.source: The recognizer returns recognition results in a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult> object.
trans-unit.target: Tolken returnerar resultat i en <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult>objektet.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult>

trans-unit.source: - To synchronize changes to the recognizer, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: -Om du vill synkronisera ändringar i tolken, använda den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A>

trans-unit.source: The recognizer uses more than one thread to perform tasks.
trans-unit.target: Tolken använder mer än en tråd för att utföra uppgifter.

trans-unit.source: - To emulate input to the recognizer, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognize%2A> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: – För att emulera indata till tolken, den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognize%2A>och <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A>metoder.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognize%2A>

trans-unit.source: The SpeechRecognitionEngine object is for the sole use of the process that instantiated the object.
trans-unit.target: Objektet SpeechRecognitionEngine är användas för processen som instansieras objektet.

trans-unit.source: By contrast, the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer> shares a single recognizer with any application that wants to use it.
trans-unit.target: Som kontrast, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>delar ett enda tolken med alla program som vill använda det.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Always call <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.Dispose%2A> before you release your last reference to the speech recognizer.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Alltid anropet <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.Dispose%2A>innan du släpper ditt senaste referens till taligenkänningen.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the recognizer object's `Finalize` method.
trans-unit.target: Annars resurser den använder frigörs inte förrän skräpinsamlingen anropar tolken objektets `Finalize` metod.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> class using the default speech recognizer for the system.
trans-unit.target: Initierar en ny instans av den <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> klassen använder taligenkänningen standard för systemet.

trans-unit.source: Before the speech recognizer can begin speech recognition, you must load at least one recognition grammar and configure the input for the recognizer.
trans-unit.target: Innan taligenkänningen kan taligenkänning kan du läsa in minst en recognition grammatik och konfigurera indata för tolkning.

trans-unit.source: To load a grammar, call the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammar%2A> or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammarAsync%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: För att läsa in en grammatik anropa den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammar%2A>eller <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammarAsync%2A>metod.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammarAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammar%2A>

trans-unit.source: To configure the audio input, use one of the following methods: - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToAudioStream%2A> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToDefaultAudioDevice%2A> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToNull%2A> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveFile%2A> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveStream%2A>
trans-unit.target: Använd någon av följande metoder för att konfigurera ljud indata:- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToAudioStream%2A>- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToDefaultAudioDevice%2A>- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToNull%2A>- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveFile%2A>- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveStream%2A></xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveStream%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveFile%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToNull%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToDefaultAudioDevice%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToAudioStream%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> class using the default speech recognizer for a specified locale.
trans-unit.target: Initierar en ny instans av den <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> klassen med taligenkänningen standard för ett angivet språk.

trans-unit.source: Microsoft Windows and the System.Speech API accept all valid language-country codes.
trans-unit.target: Microsoft Windows och System.Speech API acceptera alla giltiga språk-landskoder.

trans-unit.source: To perform speech recognition using the language specified in the `CultureInfo` argument, a speech recognition engine that supports that language-country code must be installed.
trans-unit.target: Att utföra taligenkänning med hjälp av det språk som anges i den `CultureInfo` argumentet, ett taligenkänningsmotorn som har stöd för språket landskod måste vara installerad.

trans-unit.source: The speech recognition engines that shipped with Microsoft Windows 7 work with the following language-country codes.
trans-unit.target: Taligenkänningsmotorer som levereras med Microsoft Windows 7 arbeta med följande språk-landskoder.

trans-unit.source: - en-GB.
trans-unit.target: -en-GB.

trans-unit.source: English (United Kingdom) - en-US.
trans-unit.target: Engelska (Storbritannien) - en-US.

trans-unit.source: English (United States) - de-DE.
trans-unit.target: Engelska (USA) - de-DE.

trans-unit.source: German (Germany) - es-ES.
trans-unit.target: Tyska (Tyskland) - es-ES.

trans-unit.source: Spanish (Spain) - fr-FR.
trans-unit.target: Spanska (Spanien) - fr-FR.

trans-unit.source: French (France) - ja-JP.
trans-unit.target: Franska (Frankrike) - ja-JP.

trans-unit.source: Japanese (Japan) - zh-CN.
trans-unit.target: Japanska (Japan) - zh-CN.

trans-unit.source: Chinese (China) - zh-TW.
trans-unit.target: Kinesiska (Kina) - zh-TW.

trans-unit.source: Chinese (Taiwan) Two-letter language codes such as "en", "fr", or "es" are also permitted.
trans-unit.target: Kinesiska (Taiwan) två bokstäver språkkoder, till exempel "SV", "fr" eller "es" får heller.

trans-unit.source: Before the speech recognizer can begin recognition, you must load at least one speech recognition grammar and configure the input for the recognizer.
trans-unit.target: Innan taligenkänningen kan recognition kan du läsa in minst en speech recognition grammatik och konfigurera indata för tolkning.

trans-unit.source: To load a grammar, call the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammar%2A> or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammarAsync%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: För att läsa in en grammatik anropa den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammar%2A>eller <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammarAsync%2A>metod.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammarAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammar%2A>

trans-unit.source: To configure the audio input, use one of the following methods: - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToAudioStream%2A> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToDefaultAudioDevice%2A> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToNull%2A> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveFile%2A> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveStream%2A>
trans-unit.target: Använd någon av följande metoder för att konfigurera ljud indata:- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToAudioStream%2A>- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToDefaultAudioDevice%2A>- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToNull%2A>- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveFile%2A>- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveStream%2A></xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveStream%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveFile%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToNull%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToDefaultAudioDevice%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToAudioStream%2A>

trans-unit.source: The locale that the speech recognizer must support.
trans-unit.target: Det språk som måste ha stöd för taligenkänningen.

trans-unit.source: None of the installed speech recognizers support the specified locale, or culture is the invariant culture.
trans-unit.target: Ingen av de installerade taligenkänning stöder den angivna, eller culture är den invariabla kulturen.

trans-unit.source: Culture is .
trans-unit.target: Cultureis .

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> using the information in a <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerInfo"></xref> object to specify the recognizer to use.
trans-unit.target: Initierar en ny instans av den <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> med hjälp av informationen i en <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerInfo"> </xref> objekt för att ange tolk för att använda.

trans-unit.source: You can create an instance of this class for any of the installed speech recognizers.
trans-unit.target: Du kan skapa en instans av den här klassen för någon av de installerade taligenkänning.

trans-unit.source: To get information about which recognizers are installed, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InstalledRecognizers%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: För att få information om vilka är installerade, använda den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InstalledRecognizers%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InstalledRecognizers%2A>

trans-unit.source: Before the speech recognizer can begin recognition, you must load at least one speech recognition grammar and configure the input for the recognizer.
trans-unit.target: Innan taligenkänningen kan recognition kan du läsa in minst en speech recognition grammatik och konfigurera indata för tolkning.

trans-unit.source: To load a grammar, call the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammar%2A> or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammarAsync%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: För att läsa in en grammatik anropa den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammar%2A>eller <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammarAsync%2A>metod.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammarAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammar%2A>

trans-unit.source: To configure the audio input, use one of the following methods: - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToAudioStream%2A> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToDefaultAudioDevice%2A> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToNull%2A> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveFile%2A> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveStream%2A>
trans-unit.target: Använd någon av följande metoder för att konfigurera ljud indata:- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToAudioStream%2A>- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToDefaultAudioDevice%2A>- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToNull%2A>- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveFile%2A>- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveStream%2A></xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveStream%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveFile%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToNull%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToDefaultAudioDevice%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToAudioStream%2A>

trans-unit.source: The information for the specific speech recognizer.
trans-unit.target: Information för specifika taligenkänningen.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> class with a string parameter that specifies the name of the recognizer to use.
trans-unit.target: Initierar en ny instans av den <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> klass med en strängparameter som anger namnet på tolk för att använda.

trans-unit.source: The token name of the recognizer is the value of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerInfo.Id%2A> property of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerInfo> object returned by the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizerInfo%2A> property of the recognizer.
trans-unit.target: Namnet på token tolken är värdet för den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerInfo.Id%2A>-egenskapen för den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerInfo>objektet som returnerades av den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizerInfo%2A>egenskapen för tolken.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizerInfo%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerInfo> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerInfo.Id%2A>

trans-unit.source: To get a collection of all the installed recognizers, use the static <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InstalledRecognizers%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: För att få en samling med alla installerade identifierare, använder du statiskhet <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InstalledRecognizers%2A>metod.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InstalledRecognizers%2A>

trans-unit.source: Before the speech recognizer can begin recognition, you must load at least one speech recognition grammar and configure the input for the recognizer.
trans-unit.target: Innan taligenkänningen kan recognition kan du läsa in minst en speech recognition grammatik och konfigurera indata för tolkning.

trans-unit.source: To load a grammar, call the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammar%2A> or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammarAsync%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: För att läsa in en grammatik anropa den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammar%2A>eller <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammarAsync%2A>metod.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammarAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammar%2A>

trans-unit.target: Använd någon av följande metoder för att konfigurera ljud indata:- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToAudioStream%2A>- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToDefaultAudioDevice%2A>- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToNull%2A>- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveFile%2A>- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveStream%2A></xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveStream%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveFile%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToNull%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToDefaultAudioDevice%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToAudioStream%2A>

trans-unit.source: The token name of the speech recognizer to use.
trans-unit.target: Namnet på token för taligenkänningen ska användas.

trans-unit.source: No speech recognizer with that token name is installed, or recognizerId is the empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: Inga taligenkänningen med det token-namnet installeras, eller recognizerId är en tom sträng ("").

trans-unit.source: recognizerId is .
trans-unit.target: recognizerIdis .

trans-unit.source: Gets the format of the audio being received by the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar formatet för ljud tas emot av den <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: To configure the audio input, use one of the following methods: - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToAudioStream%2A> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToDefaultAudioDevice%2A> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToNull%2A> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveFile%2A> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveStream%2A>
trans-unit.target: Använd någon av följande metoder för att konfigurera ljud indata:- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToAudioStream%2A>- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToDefaultAudioDevice%2A>- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToNull%2A>- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveFile%2A>- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveStream%2A></xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveStream%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveFile%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToNull%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToDefaultAudioDevice%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToAudioStream%2A>

trans-unit.source: The format of audio at the input to the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> instance, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the input is not configured or set to the null input.
trans-unit.target: Formatet för ljud på indata för den <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> instans, eller <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> om indata inte är konfigurerad eller inställt på null-indata.

trans-unit.source: Gets the level of the audio being received by the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar nivån för den tas emot av den <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The value 0 represents silence, and 100 represents the maximum input volume.
trans-unit.target: Värdet 0 representerar tystnad och 100 representerar maximala volymen.

trans-unit.source: The audio level of the input to the speech recognizer, from 0 through 100.
trans-unit.target: Ljud andelen indata för taligenkänningen, mellan 0 och 100.

trans-unit.source: Raised when the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> reports the level of its audio input.
trans-unit.target: Utlöses när den <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> rapporterar nivån av dess ljudinsignal.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> raises this event multiple times per second.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>skapat händelsen flera gånger per sekund.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>

trans-unit.source: The frequency with which the event is raised depends on the computer on which the application is running.
trans-unit.target: Den frekvens som händelsen visas beror på den dator där programmet körs.

trans-unit.source: To get the audio level at the time of the event, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioLevelUpdatedEventArgs.AudioLevel%2A> property of the associated <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioLevelUpdatedEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: För att få nivån ljud vid tidpunkten för händelsen, använder du <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioLevelUpdatedEventArgs.AudioLevel%2A>egenskapen i associerade <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioLevelUpdatedEventArgs>.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioLevelUpdatedEventArgs> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioLevelUpdatedEventArgs.AudioLevel%2A>

trans-unit.source: To get the current audio level of the input to the recognizer, use the recognizer's <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioLevel%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Om du vill skaffa den aktuella ljud indata till tolken, använder du tolken <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioLevel%2A>egenskap.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioLevel%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you create an AudioLevelUpdated delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: När du skapar en AudioLevelUpdated delegat kan identifiera den metod som hanterar händelsen.

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: Lägga till en instans av delegaten händelsen om du vill associera händelsen med din händelsehanterare.

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: Händelsehanteraren anropas när händelsen inträffar, om du tar bort delegaten.

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Events and Delegates](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418).
trans-unit.target: Läs mer om händelsehanteraren delegater [händelser och delegater](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som ska läggas till.

trans-unit.source: Gets the current location in the audio stream being generated by the device that is providing input to the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar den aktuella platsen i ljudström som skapas av den enhet som tillhandahåller indata för den <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The AudioPosition property references the input device's position in its generated audio stream.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen AudioPosition refererar inkommande enhetens position i den genererade ljudströmmen.

trans-unit.source: By contrast, the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizerAudioPosition%2A> property references the recognizer's position within its audio input.
trans-unit.target: Däremot kommer den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizerAudioPosition%2A>refererar till den tolken position inom dess ljudinsignal.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizerAudioPosition%2A>

trans-unit.source: These positions can be different.
trans-unit.target: Dessa platser kan vara olika.

trans-unit.source: For example, if the recognizer has received input for which it has not yet generated a recognition result then the value of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizerAudioPosition%2A> property is less than the value of the AudioPosition property.
trans-unit.target: Till exempel om tolken har tagit emot indata för vilka det har inte ännu genereras ett recognition resultat och värdet för den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizerAudioPosition%2A>egenskapen är mindre än värdet på egenskapen AudioPosition.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizerAudioPosition%2A>

trans-unit.source: The current location in the audio stream being generated by the input device.
trans-unit.target: Den aktuella platsen i ljudström som skapas av inkommande enheten.

trans-unit.source: Raised when the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> detects a problem in the audio signal.
trans-unit.target: Utlöses när den <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> identifierar ett problem i ljud signalen.

trans-unit.source: To get which problem occurred, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioSignalProblemOccurredEventArgs.AudioSignalProblem%2A> property of the associated <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioSignalProblemOccurredEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: Använd <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioSignalProblemOccurredEventArgs.AudioSignalProblem%2A>egenskapen för den associera <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioSignalProblemOccurredEventArgs>.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioSignalProblemOccurredEventArgs> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioSignalProblemOccurredEventArgs.AudioSignalProblem%2A> för att få vilka problem uppstod

trans-unit.source: When you create an AudioSignalProblemOccurred delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: När du skapar en AudioSignalProblemOccurred delegat kan identifiera den metod som hanterar händelsen.

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: Lägga till en instans av delegaten händelsen om du vill associera händelsen med din händelsehanterare.

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: Händelsehanteraren anropas när händelsen inträffar, om du tar bort delegaten.

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Events and Delegates](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418).
trans-unit.target: Läs mer om händelsehanteraren delegater [händelser och delegater](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418).

trans-unit.target: Som ska läggas till.

trans-unit.source: Gets the state of the audio being received by the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar status för ljud tas emot av den <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The AudioState property represents the audio state with a member of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioState> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen AudioState representerar tillståndet ljud med en medlem i den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioState>uppräkningen.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioState>

trans-unit.source: The state of the audio input to the speech recognizer.
trans-unit.target: Status för ljud indata för taligenkänningen.

trans-unit.source: Raised when the state changes in the audio being received by the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Inträffar när tillståndsändringar i ljuduppspelningen tas emot av den <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: To get the audio state at the time of the event, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioStateChangedEventArgs.AudioState%2A> property of the associated <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioStateChangedEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: För att få ljud tillståndet vid tidpunkten för händelsen, använder du <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioStateChangedEventArgs.AudioState%2A>egenskapen i associerade <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioStateChangedEventArgs>.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioStateChangedEventArgs> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioStateChangedEventArgs.AudioState%2A>

trans-unit.source: To get the current audio state of the input to the recognizer, use the recognizer's <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioState%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: För att hämta indata till tolken aktuella ljud tillstånd, använder du tolken <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioState%2A>egenskap.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioState%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about audio state, see the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioState> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Mer information om ljud tillstånd finns det <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioState>uppräkningen.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioState>

trans-unit.source: When you create an AudioStateChanged delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: När du skapar en AudioStateChanged delegat kan identifiera den metod som hanterar händelsen.

trans-unit.target: Lägga till en instans av delegaten händelsen om du vill associera händelsen med din händelsehanterare.

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the time interval during which a <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> accepts input containing only background noise, before finalizing recognition.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar eller anger tidsintervallet under vilka en <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> accepterar indata som innehåller endast bakgrundsljud, innan du slutför igenkänning.

trans-unit.source: Each speech recognizer has an algorithm to distinguish between silence and speech.
trans-unit.target: Varje taligenkänningen har en algoritm för att skilja mellan tystnad och tal.

trans-unit.source: The recognizer classifies as background noise any non-silence input that does not match the initial rule of any of the recognizer's loaded and enabled speech recognition grammars.
trans-unit.target: Tolken klassificerar som bakgrundsljud alla tystnad indata som inte matchar inledande regeln för någon av tolken läses in och aktiverat tal recognition grammatik.

trans-unit.source: If the recognizer receives only background noise and silence within the babble timeout interval, then the recognizer finalizes that recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: Om tolken får endast bakgrundsljud och tystnad innan timeout babble, Slutför tolken recognition åtgärden.

trans-unit.source: - For asynchronous recognition operations, the recognizer raises the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted> event, where the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs.BabbleTimeout%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is `true`, and the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs.Result%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is `null`.
trans-unit.target: -För igenkänning av asynkrona åtgärder tolken genererar den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted>händelse, där den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs.BabbleTimeout%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen är `true`, och <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs.Result%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen är `null`.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs.Result%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs.BabbleTimeout%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted>

trans-unit.source: - For synchronous recognition operations and emulation, the recognizer returns `null`, instead of a valid <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult>.
trans-unit.target: -För synkron recognition åtgärder och emulering, tolken returnerar `null`, i stället för ett giltigt <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult>.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult>

trans-unit.source: If the babble timeout period is set to 0, the recognizer does not perform a babble timeout check.
trans-unit.target: Om tidsgränsen babble anges till 0 tolken inte att utföra en babble timeout-kontroll.

trans-unit.source: The timeout interval can be any non-negative value.
trans-unit.target: Timeout-intervall kan vara ett negativt värde.

trans-unit.source: The default is 0 seconds.
trans-unit.target: Standardvärdet är 0 sekunder.

trans-unit.source: The duration of the time interval.
trans-unit.target: Varaktighet för tidsintervallet.

trans-unit.source: This property is set to less than 0 seconds.
trans-unit.target: Den här egenskapen anges till mindre än 0 sekunder.

trans-unit.source: Disposes the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Förfogar den <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> objekt.

trans-unit.source: Disposes the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> object and releases resources used during the session.
trans-unit.target: Förfogar den <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> objekt och versioner av de resurser som används under sessionen.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Frisläpp både hanterade och ohanterade resurser. <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> att släppa endast resurser som inte hanteras.

trans-unit.source: Emulates input of a phrase to the speech recognizer, using text in place of audio for synchronous speech recognition.
trans-unit.target: Emulerar indata av en fras för taligenkänningen via SMS i stället för ljud för synkron taligenkänning.

trans-unit.source: The speech recognizer raises the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechDetected>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechHypothesized>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognitionRejected>, and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized> events as if the recognition operation is not emulated.
trans-unit.target: Speech recognizer aktiverar den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechDetected>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechHypothesized>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognitionRejected>, och <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized>händelser som om åtgärden recognition inte emuleras.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognitionRejected> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechHypothesized> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechDetected>

trans-unit.source: The recognizers that ship with Vista and Windows 7 ignore case and character width when applying grammar rules to the input phrase.
trans-unit.target: Identifierare som levereras med Vista och Windows 7 Ignorera skiftläge och tecknet bredd när du använder grammatik regler för inkommande frasen.

trans-unit.source: For more information about this type of comparison, see the <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions> enumeration values <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions> and <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions>.
trans-unit.target: Mer information om den här typen av jämförelse finns i <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions>uppräkningen värden <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions>och <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions>.</xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions> </xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions> </xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions>

trans-unit.source: The recognizers also ignore new lines and extra white space and treat punctuation as literal input.
trans-unit.target: Identifierarna också Ignorera nya rader och extra blanksteg och skiljetecken behandlas som litteralt indata.

trans-unit.source: The input for the recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: Indata för igenkänning igen.

trans-unit.source: The result for the recognition operation, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the operation is not successful or the recognizer is not enabled.
trans-unit.target: Resultatet för igenkänning-åtgärden eller <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> om det går inte att genomföra åtgärden eller tolken är inte aktiverad.

trans-unit.source: The recognizer has no speech recognition grammars loaded.
trans-unit.target: Identifieraren har inga speech recognition grammatik läses in.

trans-unit.source: inputText is .
trans-unit.target: inputTextis .

trans-unit.source: inputText is the empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: inputTextär en tom sträng ("").

trans-unit.source: Emulates input of specific words to the speech recognizer, using text in place of audio for synchronous speech recognition, and specifies how the recognizer handles Unicode comparison between the words and the loaded speech recognition grammars.
trans-unit.target: Emulerar indata för specifika ord för taligenkänningen via SMS i stället för ljud för synkron taligenkänning och anger hur tolken hanterar Unicode jämförelse mellan orden och läsa in speech recognition grammatik.

trans-unit.source: The speech recognizer raises the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechDetected>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechHypothesized>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognitionRejected>, and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized> events as if the recognition operation is not emulated.
trans-unit.target: Speech recognizer aktiverar den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechDetected>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechHypothesized>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognitionRejected>, och <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized>händelser som om åtgärden recognition inte emuleras.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognitionRejected> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechHypothesized> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechDetected>

trans-unit.source: The recognizer uses `compareOptions` when it applies grammar rules to the input phrase.
trans-unit.target: Tolken använder `compareOptions` när det gäller grammatik regler för inkommande frasen.

trans-unit.source: The recognizers that ship with Vista and Windows 7 ignore case if the <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions> or <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions> value is present.
trans-unit.target: Identifierare som levereras med Vista och Windows 7 Ignorera skiftläge om den <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions>eller <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions>värdet finns.</xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions> </xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions>

trans-unit.source: The recognizer always ignores the character width and never ignores the Kana type.
trans-unit.target: Tolken ignorerar alltid teckenbredden och aldrig ignorerar Kana-typen.

trans-unit.source: The recognizer also ignores new lines and extra white space and treats punctuation as literal input.
trans-unit.target: Tolken också ignorerar nya rader och extra blanksteg och skiljetecken behandlas som litteralt indata.

trans-unit.source: For more information about character width and Kana type, see the <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Läs mer om teckenbredden och Kana-typ, den <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions>uppräkningen.</xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions>

trans-unit.source: An array of word units that contains the input for the recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: En matris med word enheter som innehåller indata för igenkänning igen.

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the enumeration values that describe the type of comparison to use for the emulated recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: En binär kombination av uppräkningsvärdena som beskriver typ av jämförelse som ska användas för emulerade recognition igen.

trans-unit.source: The result for the recognition operation, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the operation is not successful or the recognizer is not enabled.
trans-unit.target: Resultatet för igenkänning-åtgärden eller <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> om det går inte att genomföra åtgärden eller tolken är inte aktiverad.

trans-unit.source: The recognizer has no speech recognition grammars loaded.
trans-unit.target: Identifieraren har inga speech recognition grammatik läses in.

trans-unit.source: wordUnits is .
trans-unit.target: wordUnitsis .

trans-unit.source: wordUnits contains one or more elements.
trans-unit.target: wordUnitsinnehåller en eller flera element.

trans-unit.target: compareOptionsinnehåller den , , eller flaggan.

trans-unit.source: The recognizer uses `compareOptions` when it applies grammar rules to the input phrase.

trans-unit.source: Raised when the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> finalizes an asynchronous recognition operation of emulated input.
trans-unit.target: Utlöses när den <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> Slutför en asynkron recognition åtgärd emulerade indata.

trans-unit.source: Each <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A> method begins an asynchronous recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: Varje <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A>metoden börjar en asynkron recognition åtgärd.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> raises the EmulateRecognizeCompleted event when it finalizes the asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>genererar EmulateRecognizeCompleted händelsen när den Slutför den asynkrona åtgärden.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A> operation can raise the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechDetected>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechHypothesized>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognitionRejected>, and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized> events.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A>åtgärden kan öka den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechDetected>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechHypothesized>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognitionRejected>, och <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized>händelser.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognitionRejected> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechHypothesized> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechDetected> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A>

trans-unit.source: The EmulateRecognizeCompleted event is the last such event that the recognizer raises for a given operation.
trans-unit.target: Händelsen EmulateRecognizeCompleted är sist sådan händelse att tolken genererar för en viss åtgärd.

trans-unit.source: If emulated recognition was successful, you can access the recognition result using the either of the following: - The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.EmulateRecognizeCompletedEventArgs.Result%2A> property in the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.EmulateRecognizeCompletedEventArgs> object in the handler for the EmulateRecognizeCompleted event.
trans-unit.target: Om emulerade recognition lyckades, du kan komma åt recognition resultatet med något av följande: - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.EmulateRecognizeCompletedEventArgs.Result%2A>egenskap i den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.EmulateRecognizeCompletedEventArgs>objekt i hanteraren för händelsen EmulateRecognizeCompleted.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.EmulateRecognizeCompletedEventArgs> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.EmulateRecognizeCompletedEventArgs.Result%2A>

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionEventArgs.Result%2A> property in the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizedEventArgs> object in the handler for the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized> event.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionEventArgs.Result%2A>egenskap i den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizedEventArgs>objekt i hanteraren för den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized>händelse.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizedEventArgs> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionEventArgs.Result%2A>

trans-unit.source: If emulated recognition was not successful, the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized> event is not raised and the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.EmulateRecognizeCompletedEventArgs.Result%2A> will be null.
trans-unit.target: Om emulerade recognition inte lyckades, i <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized>händelse utlöses inte och <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.EmulateRecognizeCompletedEventArgs.Result%2A>är null.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.EmulateRecognizeCompletedEventArgs.Result%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.EmulateRecognizeCompletedEventArgs> derives from <xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.EmulateRecognizeCompletedEventArgs>härleds från <xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs></xref:System.Speech.Recognition.EmulateRecognizeCompletedEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizedEventArgs> derives from <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizedEventArgs>härleds från <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionEventArgs>.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionEventArgs></xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizedEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: When you create an EmulateRecognizeCompleted delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: När du skapar en EmulateRecognizeCompleted delegat kan identifiera den metod som hanterar händelsen.

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: Lägga till en instans av delegaten händelsen om du vill associera händelsen med din händelsehanterare.

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: Händelsehanteraren anropas när händelsen inträffar, om du tar bort delegaten.

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Events and Delegates](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418).
trans-unit.target: Läs mer om händelsehanteraren delegater [händelser och delegater](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som ska läggas till.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the interval of silence that the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> will accept at the end of unambiguous input before finalizing a recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar eller anger intervallet tystnad som den <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> accepterar i slutet av entydigt indata innan du slutför en recognition-åtgärd.

trans-unit.source: The speech recognizer uses this timeout interval when the recognition input is unambiguous.
trans-unit.target: Taligenkänningsmotorn används timeout-intervall om recognition indata är tvetydigt.

trans-unit.source: For example, for a speech recognition grammar that supports recognition of either "new game please" or "new game", "new game please" is an unambiguous input, and "new game" is an ambiguous input.
trans-unit.target: Exempelvis för en speech recognition grammatik som stöd för identifiering av antingen "nytt spel du" eller "nytt spel", "nya spel du" entydigt indata och "nytt spel" är tvetydig indata.

trans-unit.source: This property determines how long the speech recognition engine will wait for additional input before finalizing a recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: Den här egenskapen anger hur länge taligenkänningsmotorn väntar för ytterligare information innan du slutför en recognition-åtgärd.

trans-unit.source: The timeout interval can be from 0 seconds to 10 seconds, inclusive.
trans-unit.target: Timeout-intervall kan vara från 0 sekunder till 10 sekunder.

trans-unit.source: The default is 150 milliseconds.
trans-unit.target: Standardvärdet är 150 millisekunder.

trans-unit.source: To set the timeout interval for ambiguous input, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeoutAmbiguous%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Om du vill ange timeout för tvetydig indata, använda den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeoutAmbiguous%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeoutAmbiguous%2A>

trans-unit.source: The duration of the interval of silence.
trans-unit.target: Varaktighet för intervallet tystnad.

trans-unit.source: This property is set to less than 0 seconds or greater than 10 seconds.
trans-unit.target: Den här egenskapen anges till mindre än 0 sekunder eller mer än 10 sekunder.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the interval of silence that the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> will accept at the end of ambiguous input before finalizing a recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar eller anger intervallet tystnad som den <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> accepterar i slutet av tvetydig indata innan du slutför en recognition-åtgärd.

trans-unit.source: The speech recognizer uses this timeout interval when the recognition input is ambiguous.
trans-unit.target: Taligenkänningsmotorn används timeout-intervall om recognition indata är tvetydig.

trans-unit.source: For example, for a speech recognition grammar that supports recognition of either "new game please" or "new game", "new game please" is an unambiguous input, and "new game" is an ambiguous input.
trans-unit.target: Exempelvis för en speech recognition grammatik som stöd för identifiering av antingen "nytt spel du" eller "nytt spel", "nya spel du" entydigt indata och "nytt spel" är tvetydig indata.

trans-unit.source: This property determines how long the speech recognition engine will wait for additional input before finalizing a recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: Den här egenskapen anger hur länge taligenkänningsmotorn väntar för ytterligare information innan du slutför en recognition-åtgärd.

trans-unit.source: The timeout interval can be from 0 seconds to 10 seconds, inclusive.
trans-unit.target: Timeout-intervall kan vara från 0 sekunder till 10 sekunder.

trans-unit.source: The default is 500 milliseconds.
trans-unit.target: Standardvärdet är 500 millisekunder.

trans-unit.source: To set the timeout interval for unambiguous input, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeout%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Om du vill ange timeout för entydigt indata, använda den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeout%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeout%2A>

trans-unit.source: The duration of the interval of silence.
trans-unit.target: Varaktighet för intervallet tystnad.

trans-unit.source: This property is set to less than 0 seconds or greater than 10 seconds.
trans-unit.target: Den här egenskapen anges till mindre än 0 sekunder eller mer än 10 sekunder.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar"></xref> objects that are loaded in this <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar en samling av <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar"> </xref> objekt som lästs in i den här <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> instans.

trans-unit.source: The collection of <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Insamling av <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar"> </xref> objekt.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the time interval during which a <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> accepts input containing only silence before finalizing recognition.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar eller anger tidsintervallet under vilka en <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> accepterar indata som innehåller endast tystnad innan du slutför igenkänning.

trans-unit.source: Each speech recognizer has an algorithm to distinguish between silence and speech.
trans-unit.target: Varje taligenkänningen har en algoritm för att skilja mellan tystnad och tal.

trans-unit.source: If the recognizer input is silence during the initial silence timeout period, then the recognizer finalizes that recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: Om tolken indata tystnad vid tidsgränsen för inledande tystnad, Slutför tolken recognition åtgärden.

trans-unit.source: - For asynchronous recognition operations and emulation, the recognizer raises the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted> event, where the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs.InitialSilenceTimeout%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is `true`, and the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs.Result%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is `null`.
trans-unit.target: -För igenkänning av asynkrona åtgärder och emulering, tolken genererar den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted>händelse, där den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs.InitialSilenceTimeout%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen är `true`, och <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs.Result%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen är `null`.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs.Result%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs.InitialSilenceTimeout%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted>

trans-unit.source: - For synchronous recognition operations and emulation, the recognizer returns `null`, instead of a valid <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult>.
trans-unit.target: -För synkron recognition åtgärder och emulering, tolken returnerar `null`, i stället för ett giltigt <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult>.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult>

trans-unit.source: If the initial silence timeout interval is set to 0, the recognizer does not perform an initial silence timeout check.
trans-unit.target: Om inledande tystnad timeout-intervall har angetts till 0 tolken inte att utföra en inledande tystnad timeout-kontroll.

trans-unit.source: The timeout interval can be any non-negative value.
trans-unit.target: Timeout-intervall kan vara ett negativt värde.

trans-unit.source: The default is 0 seconds.
trans-unit.target: Standardvärdet är 0 sekunder.

trans-unit.source: The duration of the interval of silence.
trans-unit.target: Varaktighet för intervallet tystnad.

trans-unit.source: This property is set to less than 0 seconds.
trans-unit.target: Den här egenskapen anges till mindre än 0 sekunder.

trans-unit.source: Returns information for all of the installed speech recognizers on the current system.
trans-unit.target: Returnerar information för alla installerade taligenkänning i systemet.

trans-unit.source: To get information about the current recognizer, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizerInfo%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: För att få information om aktuella tolken kan använda den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizerInfo%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizerInfo%2A>

trans-unit.source: A read-only collection of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerInfo"></xref> objects that describe the installed recognizers.
trans-unit.target: En skrivskyddad samling av <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerInfo"> </xref> objekt som beskriver de installerade identifierarna.

trans-unit.source: Synchronously loads a <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Synkront läser in en <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar"> </xref> objekt.

trans-unit.source: The recognizer throws an exception if the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> object is already loaded, is being asynchronously loaded, or has failed to load into any recognizer.
trans-unit.target: Tolken genererar ett undantag om den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>objekt har redan lästs in, läses asynkront eller gick inte att läsa in i alla tolken.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>

trans-unit.source: You cannot load the same <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> object into multiple instances of <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>.
trans-unit.target: Du kan inte läsa in samma <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>objekt till flera instanser av <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>

trans-unit.source: Instead, create a new <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> object for each <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> instance.
trans-unit.target: I stället skapa ett nytt <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>objekt för varje <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>instans.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>

trans-unit.source: If the recognizer is running, applications must use <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A> to pause the speech recognition engine before loading, unloading, enabling, or disabling a grammar.
trans-unit.target: Om tolken körs program använda <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A>att pausa taligenkänningsmotorn före inläsning av, inaktivera, aktivera eller inaktivera en grammatik.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you load a grammar, it is enabled by default.

trans-unit.source: To disable a loaded grammar, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.Enabled%2A> property.

trans-unit.source: To load a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> object asynchronously, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammarAsync%2A> method.

trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>genererar den här händelsen när åtgärden slutförts.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>
