trans-unit.source: When you create a LoadGrammarCompleted delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: När du skapar en LoadGrammarCompleted delegat kan identifiera den metod som hanterar händelsen.

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: Lägga till en instans av delegaten händelsen om du vill associera händelsen med din händelsehanterare.

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: Händelsehanteraren anropas när händelsen inträffar, om du tar bort delegaten.

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Events and Delegates](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418).
trans-unit.target: Läs mer om händelsehanteraren delegater [händelser och delegater](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som ska läggas till.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the maximum number of alternate recognition results that the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> returns for each recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar eller anger det maximala antalet alternativa resultat som den <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> returnerar för varje recognition-åtgärd.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.Alternates%2A> property of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult> class contains the collection of <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedPhrase> objects that represent possible interpretations of the input.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.Alternates%2A>egenskapen för den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult>klassen innehåller samlingen av <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedPhrase>objekt som representerar möjliga tolkning av indata.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedPhrase> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.Alternates%2A>

trans-unit.source: The default value for MaxAlternates is 10.
trans-unit.target: Standardvärdet för MaxAlternates är 10.

trans-unit.source: The number of alternate results to return.
trans-unit.target: Antal alternativa resultat som ska returneras.

trans-unit.source: MaxAlternates is set to a value less than 0.
trans-unit.target: MaxAlternates har angetts till ett värde som är mindre än 0.

trans-unit.source: Returns the values of settings for the recognizer.
trans-unit.target: Returnerar värden för inställningar för tolkning.

trans-unit.source: Recognizer settings can contain string, 64-bit integer, or memory address data.
trans-unit.target: Tolkens inställningar kan innehålla sträng, 64-bitars heltal eller minne adressdata.

trans-unit.source: The following table describes the settings that are defined for a Microsoft Speech API (SAPI)-compliant recognizer.
trans-unit.target: I följande tabell beskrivs de inställningar som har definierats för en Microsoft Speech API (SAPI)-kompatibla identifierare.

trans-unit.source: The following settings must have the same range for each recognizer that supports the setting.
trans-unit.target: Följande inställningar måste ha samma intervall för varje identifierare som har stöd för inställningen.

trans-unit.source: A SAPI-compliant recognizer is not required to support these settings and can support other settings.
trans-unit.target: En SAPI-kompatibel identifierare kan behöver inte stöd för dessa inställningar och andra inställningar.

trans-unit.source: |Name|Description| |----------|-----------------| |`ResourceUsage`|Specifies the recognizer's CPU consumption.
trans-unit.target: | Namnet | Beskrivning | |----------|-----------------| | `ResourceUsage`| Anger den tolken processoranvändningen.

trans-unit.source: The range is from 0 to 100.
trans-unit.target: Intervallet är från 0 till 100.

trans-unit.source: The default value is 50.| |`ResponseSpeed`|Indicates the length of silence at the end of unambiguous input before the speech recognizer completes a recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: Standardvärdet är 50. | | `ResponseSpeed`| Anger längden på tystnad i slutet av entydigt indata innan taligenkänningen har utfört en åtgärd med igenkänning.

trans-unit.source: The range is from 0 to 10,000 milliseconds (ms).
trans-unit.target: Intervallet är från 0 till 10 000 millisekunder (ms).

trans-unit.source: This setting corresponds to the recognizer's <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeout%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Den här inställningen motsvarar tolken <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeout%2A>egenskap.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeout%2A>

trans-unit.source: Default = 150ms.| |`ComplexResponseSpeed`|Indicates the length of silence at the end of ambiguous input before the speech recognizer completes a recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: Standard = 150 MS. | | `ComplexResponseSpeed`| Anger längden på tystnad i slutet av tvetydig indata innan taligenkänningen har utfört en åtgärd med igenkänning.

trans-unit.source: The range is from 0 to 10,000ms.
trans-unit.target: Intervallet är från 0 till 10,000ms.

trans-unit.source: This setting corresponds to the recognizer's <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeoutAmbiguous%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Den här inställningen motsvarar tolken <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeoutAmbiguous%2A>egenskap.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeoutAmbiguous%2A>

trans-unit.source: Default = 500ms.| |`AdaptationOn`|Indicates whether adaptation of the acoustic model is ON (value = `1`) or OFF (value = `0`).
trans-unit.target: Standard = 500ms. | | `AdaptationOn`| Anger om anpassning av ljud modellen är aktiv (värde = `1`) eller OFF (värde = `0`).

trans-unit.source: The default value is `1` (ON).| |`PersistedBackgroundAdaptation`|Indicates whether background adaptation is ON (value = `1`) or OFF (value = `0`), and persists the setting in the registry.
trans-unit.target: Standardvärdet är `1` (på). | | `PersistedBackgroundAdaptation`| Anger om Bakgrundsanpassning är ON (värde = `1`) eller OFF (värde = `0`), och kvarstår inställningarna i registret.

trans-unit.source: The default value is `1` (ON).| To update a setting for the recognizer, use one of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.UpdateRecognizerSetting%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Standardvärdet är `1` (på). | Om du vill uppdatera en inställning för tolkning med någon av de <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.UpdateRecognizerSetting%2A>metoder.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.UpdateRecognizerSetting%2A>

trans-unit.source: The name of the setting to return.
trans-unit.target: Namnet på inställningen för att returnera.

trans-unit.source: The value of the setting.
trans-unit.target: Värdet för inställningen.

trans-unit.source: settingName is .
trans-unit.target: settingNameis .

trans-unit.source: settingName is the empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: settingNameär en tom sträng ("").

trans-unit.source: The recognizer does not have a setting by that name.
trans-unit.target: Tolken är inte en inställning med det namnet.

trans-unit.source: Performs a synchronous speech recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: Utför en synkron tal igenkänning.

trans-unit.source: This method performs a single recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: Den här metoden utför en enda igenkänning.

trans-unit.source: The recognizer performs this operation against its loaded and enabled speech recognition grammars.
trans-unit.target: Tolken utför denna åtgärd mot sin inlästa och aktiverat tal recognition grammatik.

trans-unit.source: During a call to this method, the recognizer can raise the following events: - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechDetected>.
trans-unit.target: Under ett anrop till den här metoden tolken kan medföra följande händelser:- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechDetected>.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechDetected>

trans-unit.source: Raised when the recognizer detects input that it can identify as speech.
trans-unit.target: Utlöses när tolken identifierar indata som kan identifiera som tal.

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechHypothesized>.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechHypothesized>.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechHypothesized>

trans-unit.source: Raised when input creates an ambiguous match with one of the active grammars.
trans-unit.target: Utlöses när indata skapar en tvetydig matchning med en aktiv grammatik.

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognitionRejected> or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized>.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognitionRejected> or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized>.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized></xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognitionRejected>

trans-unit.source: Raised when the recognizer finalizes a recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: Utlöses när tolken Slutför en recognition-åtgärd.

trans-unit.source: The recognizer does not raise the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted> event when using this method.
trans-unit.target: Tolken utlöser den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted>händelsen när den här metoden.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted>

trans-unit.source: The Recognize method returns a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult> object, or `null` if the operation is not successful.
trans-unit.target: Identifiera metoden returnerar en <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult>objektet, eller `null` om det inte går att genomföra åtgärden.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult>

trans-unit.source: A synchronous recognition operation can fail for the following reasons: - Speech is not detected before the timeout intervals expire for the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.BabbleTimeout%2A> or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InitialSilenceTimeout%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: En synkron recognition misslyckas av följande skäl:-taligenkänning identifieras inte innan timeoutintervall som ska gälla för den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.BabbleTimeout%2A>eller <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InitialSilenceTimeout%2A>Egenskaper.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InitialSilenceTimeout%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.BabbleTimeout%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The recognition engine detects speech but finds no matches in any of its loaded and enabled <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> objects.
trans-unit.target: -Motorn identifierar tal men inga matchningar har hittats i någon av dess inlästa och aktiverade <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>objekt.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>

trans-unit.source: To perform asynchronous recognition, use one of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsync%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Använd en av för att utföra asynkron igenkänning av <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsync%2A>metoder.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsync%2A>

trans-unit.source: The recognition result for the input, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the operation is not successful or the recognizer is not enabled.
trans-unit.target: Recognition resultatet för indata, eller <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> om det går inte att genomföra åtgärden eller tolken är inte aktiverad.

trans-unit.source: Performs a synchronous speech recognition operation with a specified initial silence timeout period.
trans-unit.target: Utför en synkron speech recognition med en angiven inledande tystnad timeout-period.

trans-unit.source: If the speech recognition engine detects speech within the time interval specified by `initialSilenceTimeout` argument, Recognize performs a single recognition operation and then terminates.
trans-unit.target: Om taligenkänningsmotorn identifierar tal inom den tidsperioden som anges av `initialSilenceTimeout` argument, identifiera utför en enda recognition och därefter avslutas.

trans-unit.source: The `initialSilenceTimeout` parameter supersedes the recognizer's <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InitialSilenceTimeout%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Den `initialSilenceTimeout` parametern ersätter tolken <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InitialSilenceTimeout%2A>egenskap.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InitialSilenceTimeout%2A>

trans-unit.source: During a call to this method, the recognizer can raise the following events: - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechDetected>.
trans-unit.target: Under ett anrop till den här metoden tolken kan medföra följande händelser:- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechDetected>.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechDetected>

trans-unit.source: Raised when the recognizer detects input that it can identify as speech.
trans-unit.target: Utlöses när tolken identifierar indata som kan identifiera som tal.

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechHypothesized>.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechHypothesized>.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechHypothesized>

trans-unit.source: Raised when input creates an ambiguous match with one of the active grammars.
trans-unit.target: Utlöses när indata skapar en tvetydig matchning med en aktiv grammatik.

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognitionRejected> or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized>.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognitionRejected> or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized>.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized></xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognitionRejected>

trans-unit.source: Raised when the recognizer finalizes a recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: Utlöses när tolken Slutför en recognition-åtgärd.

trans-unit.source: The recognizer does not raise the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted> event when using this method.
trans-unit.target: Tolken utlöser den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted>händelsen när den här metoden.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.Recognize> method returns a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult> object, or `null` if the operation is not successful.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.Recognize>metoden returnerar en <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult>objektet, eller `null` om det inte går att genomföra åtgärden.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.Recognize>

trans-unit.source: A synchronous recognition operation can fail for the following reasons: - Speech is not detected before the timeout intervals expire for the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.BabbleTimeout%2A> or for the `initialSilenceTimeout` parameter.
trans-unit.target: En synkron recognition misslyckas av följande skäl:-taligenkänning identifieras inte innan timeoutintervall som ska gälla för den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.BabbleTimeout%2A>eller för den `initialSilenceTimeout` parametern.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.BabbleTimeout%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The recognition engine detects speech but finds no matches in any of its loaded and enabled <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> objects.
trans-unit.target: -Motorn identifierar tal men inga matchningar har hittats i någon av dess inlästa och aktiverade <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>objekt.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>

trans-unit.source: To perform asynchronous recognition, use one of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsync%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Använd en av för att utföra asynkron igenkänning av <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsync%2A>metoder.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsync%2A>

trans-unit.source: The interval of time a speech recognizer accepts input containing only silence before finalizing recognition.
trans-unit.target: Tidsintervall inom vilket en taligenkänningen accepterar indata som innehåller endast tystnad innan du slutför igenkänning.

trans-unit.source: The recognition result for the input, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the operation is not successful or the recognizer is not enabled.
trans-unit.target: Recognition resultatet för indata, eller <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> om det går inte att genomföra åtgärden eller tolken är inte aktiverad.

trans-unit.source: Performs a single, asynchronous speech recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: Utför en enda, asynkron tal igenkänning.

trans-unit.source: This method performs a single, asynchronous recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: Den här metoden utför en enda, asynkron igenkänning.

trans-unit.source: The recognizer performs the operation against its loaded and enabled speech recognition grammars.
trans-unit.target: Tolken utför åtgärd mot sin inlästa och aktiverat tal recognition grammatik.

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognitionRejected> or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized>.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognitionRejected> or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized>.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized></xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognitionRejected>

trans-unit.source: Raised when the recognizer finalizes a recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: Utlöses när tolken Slutför en recognition-åtgärd.

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted>.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted>.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted>

trans-unit.target: Utlöses när en <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsync%2A>åtgärden har slutförts.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsync%2A>

trans-unit.source: To retrieve the result of an asynchronous recognition operation, attach an event handler to the recognizer's <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized> event.
trans-unit.target: Koppla en händelsehanterare för att hämta resultatet av en asynkron recognition till tolken <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized>händelse.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized>

trans-unit.source: The recognizer raises this event whenever it successfully completes a synchronous or asynchronous recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: Tolken genererar den här händelsen när den har slutfört en synkron eller asynkron åtgärd.

trans-unit.source: If recognition was not successful, the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs.Result%2A> property on <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs> object, which you can access in the handler for the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted> event, will be `null`.
trans-unit.target: Om recognition inte lyckades, den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs.Result%2A>egenskapen på <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs>-objekt som du kan komma åt i hanteraren för den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted>händelse, blir `null`.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs.Result%2A>

trans-unit.source: To perform synchronous recognition, use one of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.Recognize%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Använd en av för att utföra synkron igenkänning av <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.Recognize%2A>metoder.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.Recognize%2A>

trans-unit.source: Performs one or more asynchronous speech recognition operations.
trans-unit.target: Utför en eller flera asynkrona speech recognition åtgärder.

trans-unit.source: If `mode` is <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeMode>, the recognizer continues performing asynchronous recognition operations until the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsyncCancel%2A> or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsyncStop%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: Om `mode` är <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeMode>, tolken fortsätter utför asynkrona recognition åtgärder förrän den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsyncCancel%2A>eller <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsyncStop%2A>-metoden anropas.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsyncStop%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsyncCancel%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeMode>

trans-unit.source: During a call to this method, the recognizer can raise the following events: - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechDetected>.

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognitionRejected> or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized>.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognitionRejected> or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized>.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized></xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognitionRejected>

trans-unit.target: Utlöses när tolken Slutför en recognition-åtgärd.

trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted>.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted>

trans-unit.source: Raised when a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsync%2A> operation finishes.

trans-unit.source: To retrieve the result of an asynchronous recognition operation, attach an event handler to the recognizer's <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized> event.
trans-unit.target: Koppla en händelsehanterare för att hämta resultatet av en asynkron recognition till tolken <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized>händelse.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized>

trans-unit.source: The recognizer raises this event whenever it successfully completes a synchronous or asynchronous recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: Tolken genererar den här händelsen när den har slutfört en synkron eller asynkron åtgärd.

trans-unit.source: If recognition was not successful, the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs.Result%2A> property on <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs> object, which you can access in the handler for the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted> event, will be `null`.
trans-unit.target: Om recognition inte lyckades, den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs.Result%2A>egenskapen på <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs>-objekt som du kan komma åt i hanteraren för den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted>händelse, blir `null`.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs.Result%2A>

trans-unit.source: An asynchronous recognition operation can fail for the following reasons: - Speech is not detected before the timeout intervals expire for the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.BabbleTimeout%2A> or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InitialSilenceTimeout%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: En asynkron recognition åtgärd kan misslyckas på grund av följande:-taligenkänning identifieras inte innan timeoutintervall som ska gälla för den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.BabbleTimeout%2A>eller <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InitialSilenceTimeout%2A>Egenskaper.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InitialSilenceTimeout%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.BabbleTimeout%2A>
